data.eml:eml: Unrecognized biodiversity in a world's hotspot: three new species of Melanorivulus (Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae) from tributaries of the right bank of the Rio Parana basin, Brazilian Cerrado

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volcan, Matheus V., Severo-Neto, Francisco, Lanes, Luis Esteban K. (2018): Unrecognized biodiversity in a world's hotspot: three new species of Melanorivulus (Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae) from tributaries of the right bank of the Rio Parana basin, Brazilian Cerrado. Zoosystematics and Evolution 94 (2): 263-280, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.94.24406, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.94.24406
